bbeb9fa90cdc7ad15af60431a07a549d (02:05): from what you told me, it was never working
466e01495e8ed9159c5bdbad94ef5e60 (02:05): The problem is the lines are ended by ^M^M
1d9bbbe54bac81e44ae2729de143b736 (02:05): Chillax, it was, but it was setting the "id" on my g_images data to the "id" on the g_categories data
466e01495e8ed9159c5bdbad94ef5e60 (02:05): I cannot figure out how to tell mysql to recognize this
1d9bbbe54bac81e44ae2729de143b736 (02:06): Chillax, i want the "category" from g_images to be the (non-numeric) "category" from g_categories

1d9bbbe54bac81e44ae2729de143b736 (02:07): Chillax, ie: in g_images, all categories are an id number, which is mapped to g_categories (rows: id, category) "category" which is the text name of the category
bbeb9fa90cdc7ad15af60431a07a549d (02:07): so then select what you want
bbeb9fa90cdc7ad15af60431a07a549d (02:08): if you want the catgory name, select the category name g_categories.name or whatever
1d9bbbe54bac81e44ae2729de143b736 (02:09): i've coded about 16 hours on this app in the last 24 hours
1d9bbbe54bac81e44ae2729de143b736 (02:09): my brain is a bit fried
466e01495e8ed9159c5bdbad94ef5e60 (02:10): Does anyone have any suggestions on my problem?
d7e5970695bfd200aeb9c2c92603c1e6 (02:10): fugitbot, can't you convert the file?
466e01495e8ed9159c5bdbad94ef5e60 (02:11): I am running this on an old Unix platform
bbeb9fa90cdc7ad15af60431a07a549d (02:11): does it have vi installed?
d7e5970695bfd200aeb9c2c92603c1e6 (02:11): btw, my experience is that ^M show up after each line if you open a DOS/Windows file on Linux
466e01495e8ed9159c5bdbad94ef5e60 (02:11): but I have to do this automated
d7e5970695bfd200aeb9c2c92603c1e6 (02:12): mysql will probably always use whatever linefeed used by the system it is running on
466e01495e8ed9159c5bdbad94ef5e60 (02:12): I just dont see why Mysql LOAD DATA INFILE recognizes this
466e01495e8ed9159c5bdbad94ef5e60 (02:12): Well you pass LINES TERMINATED BY ''
466e01495e8ed9159c5bdbad94ef5e60 (02:12): But in all the examples and things it shows \n or \r\n which is not correct
466e01495e8ed9159c5bdbad94ef5e60 (02:13): I need to represent ^M some how
